content: I'm glad I could help you with tips on improving your writing skills. It's great that you attended a freelance writing workshop, and now you're looking to further develop your skills. Remember to practice regularly, read widely, and join online communities to get feedback and support. Also, don't forget to revisit the networking workshop you attended at your alma mater on the 22nd, which helped you refine your elevator pitch. Keep working on your skills, and you'll see improvement over time.
